TEXT.TITLE: ALEXANDER'S <ALX> 2ND QTR ENDS FEB 27 NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 57 cts vs 72 cts Shr diluted 57 cts vs 66 cts Net 2,699,000 vs 3,250,000 Revs 190.8 mln vs 195.9 mln Six mths Shr 45 cts vs 84 cts Shr diluted 45 cts vs 79 cts Net 2,092,000 vs 3,784,000 Revs 304.2 mln vs 304.6 mln NOTE: includes a change in accounting for investment tax credit of 1,408,000, or 31 cts per share, in six mths prior. first qtr 1987 includes non-recurring charge of 1,488,000 for company's abandoning of its plan to convert to a limited partnership. Reuter
